resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106192</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106192</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207042</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Voices from the Dust Bowl, 1940-1941</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stimmen vom Trockengebiet, 1940-1941</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voix de la cuvette de poussière, 1940-1941</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vozes da bacia de poeira, 1940-1941</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Voci dalla ciotola di polvere, 1940-1941</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φωνές από το κύπελλο σκόνης, 1940-1941</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Voces del tazón de fuente de polvo, 1940-1941</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">documents the everyday life of residents of Farm Security Administration migrant work camps in central California in 1940 and 1941. This collection, from The Charles L. Todd and Robert Sonkin Migrant Worker Collection, consists of audio recordings, photographs, manuscript materials, and publications.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">dokumentiert das tägliche Leben der Bewohner 
Bauernhof-Sicherheit Leitung der Wander- Arbeit Lager in zentralem 
Kalifornien 1940 und 1941. Diese Ansammlung, vom Charles L. Todd
und Robert Sonkin von der Gastarbeiter-Ansammlung, besteht aus 
Audioaufnahmen, Fotographien, Manuskriptmaterialien und Publikationen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">documente la vie quotidienne des résidants des 
camps migrateurs de travail de gestion de sécurité de ferme en 
Californie centrale en 1940 et 1941. Cette collection, du 
Charles L. Todd et de collection de travailleur migrant de Robert 
Sonkin, se compose des enregistrements, des photographies, des 
matériaux de manuscrit, et des publications sonores.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">documenta a vida diária dos residentes de 
acampamentos emigrantes do trabalho da administração da segurança 
da fazenda em Califórnia central em 1940 e em 1941. Esta 
coleção, do Charles L. Todd e da coleção do trabalhador emigrante 
de Robert Sonkin, consiste em gravações, em fotografias, em 
materiais do manuscrito, e em publicações audio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">documenta la vita di tutti i giorni dei residenti 
degli accampamenti migratori del lavoro della gestione di sicurezza 
dell'azienda agricola nella California centrale in 1940 ed in 1941. 
Questa accumulazione, dal Charles L. Todd e dall'accumulazione 
del lavoratore migrante del Robert Sonkin, consiste delle 
registrazioni, delle fotografie, dei materiali del manoscritto e delle
pubblicazioni audio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τεκμηριώνει την καθημερινή ζωή των κατοίκων των 
αποδημητικών στρατόπεδων εργασίας διοίκησης αγροτικής ασφάλειας 
σε κεντρική Καλιφόρνια το 1940 και το 1941. Αυτή η 
συλλογή, από τον Charles L. Todd και τη συλλογή 
διακινούμενων εργαζομένων Robert Sonkin, αποτελείται από τις
ηχητικές καταγραφές, τις φωτογραφίες, τα υλικά χειρογράφων, και 
τις δημοσιεύσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">documenta la vida diaria de residentes de los 
campos migratorios del trabajo de la administración de la seguridad 
de la granja en California central en 1940 y 1941. Esta 
colección, de Charles L. Todd y de la colección de la trabajador 
emigrante de Roberto Sonkin, consiste en grabaciones, las 
fotografías, los materiales del manuscrito, y las publicaciones 
audio.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207042</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106192</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/voices-from-the-dust-bowl-1940-1941</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
